languages.text: "Мы делим одну кровь и появились на свет из одной материнской утробы. Мы оба — истиннорожденные, и оба стоим выше сброда, появляющегося из пробирок и колб".
"We shared the same blood and we emerged into the world from the same womb. We were both Trueborn, and we both stood above the scum that comes from tubes and vials."
languages.original_text: "Мы делим одну кровь и появились на свет из одной материнской утробы. Мы оба — истиннорожденные, и оба стоим выше сброда, появляющегося из пробирок и колб".

traits.locale_text: "We share the same blood and we emerged into the world from the same womb. We are both Trueborn, and we both stand above the scum that comes from tubes and vials."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We share the same blood and we emerged into the world from the same womb. We are both Trueborn, and we both stand above the scum that comes from tubes and vials."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We share the same blood and we emerged into the world from the same womb. We are both Trueborn, and we both stand above the scum that comes from tubes and vials."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: "We shared the same blood and we emerged into the world from the same womb. We were both Trueborn, and we both stood above the scum that comes from tubes and vials."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: «Por nuestras venas corría la misma sangre y vinimos al mundo del mismo útero. Ambos éramos Legítimos, superiores a la basura que sale de tubos y viales».
languages.original_text: "We shared the same blood and we emerged into the world from the same womb. We were both Trueborn, and we both stood above the scum that comes from tubes and vials."

traits.locale_text: «Por nuestras venas corre la misma sangre y vinimos al mundo del mismo útero. Ambos somos Legítimos, superiores a la basura que sale de tubos y viales».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: “我们身上流着同样的血，从同一个子宫中来到这个世界。我们都是嫡脉，比那些从试管和烧瓶里诞生的渣滓更加高贵。”
languages.original_text: "We shared the same blood and we emerged into the world from the same womb. We were both Trueborn, and we both stood above the scum that comes from tubes and vials."

traits.locale_text: “我们身上流着同样的血，从同一个子宫中来到这个世界。我们都是嫡脉，比那些从试管和烧瓶里诞生的渣滓更加高贵。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: 「俺たちは同じ血を分かち合い、同じ子宮から生まれた。ふたりともトゥルーボーンであり、チューブや小瓶から生まれるカスどもの前に立ちはだかる存在なのさ」
languages.original_text: "We shared the same blood and we emerged into the world from the same womb. We were both Trueborn, and we both stood above the scum that comes from tubes and vials."

traits.locale_text: 「俺たちは同じ血を分かち合い、同じ子宮から生まれた。ふたりともトゥルーボーンであり、チューブや小瓶から生まれるカスどもの前に立ちはだかる存在なのさ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: « Nous partagions le même sang et étions issus de la même matrice. Nous étions tous deux des Immaculés, et en tant que tels, infiniment supérieurs à la vermine créée artificiellement dans des batteries de tubes et autres fioles. »
languages.original_text: "We shared the same blood and we emerged into the world from the same womb. We were both Trueborn, and we both stood above the scum that comes from tubes and vials."

traits.locale_text: « Nous partageons le même sang et nous sommes issus de la même matrice. Nous sommes tous deux des Immaculés, et en tant que tels, nous sommes infiniment supérieurs à la vermine créée artificiellement dans des batteries de tubes et autres fioles. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: "Wir haben dasselbe Blut und sind aus demselben Schoß in die Welt gekommen. Wir waren beide Fleischgeborene, und wir standen beide über dem Abschaum, der aus Retorten und Reagenzgläsern kommt."
languages.original_text: "We shared the same blood and we emerged into the world from the same womb. We were both Trueborn, and we both stood above the scum that comes from tubes and vials."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben dasselbe Blut und sind aus demselben Schoß in die Welt gekommen. Wir sind beide Fleischgeborene, und wir stehen beide über dem Abschaum, der aus Retorten und Reagenzgläsern kommt."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.original_text: "We share the same blood and we emerged into the world from the same womb. We are both Trueborn, and we both stand above the scum that comes from tubes and vials."

languages.text: "Aynı kandan, aynı karından dünyaya geldik. İkimiz de Saltdoğanız. O tüpten, şişeden çıkan aşağılıklara benzemeyiz."
languages.original_text: "We shared the same blood and we emerged into the world from the same womb. We were both Trueborn, and we both stood above the scum that comes from tubes and vials."

traits.locale_text: "Aynı kandan, aynı karından dünyaya geldik. İkimiz de Saltdoğanız. O tüpten, şişeden çıkan aşağılıklara benzemeyiz."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
